name: The Lich Is Back
description:
That is the problem with killing the undead. They always return from the dead (again). It is despoiling your nice village with monsters and plagues. Otherwise, you could just leave it.

The village has asked you to go redead it again. Hey, you get to keep the loot.

Developer Note:

This is my entry to the 2023 7 Day Roguelike Challenge. I have been participating regularly since 2014. I try to stay close to traditional with turn-based, procedurally generated maps and permadeath. 

I drew heavily from my 2019 and 2020 games in particular. This time I added:

  • 3 Playable Classes (Hunter, Rogue, Wizard)
  • 5 (mostly) unique skills per class
  • Leveling System
  • Inventory System
  • Lots more hand drawn art
  • Adjustable Difficulty

I hope you enjoy it and thanks for trying it!
